name: Eastward - Between Two Worlds Bundle
description:
Welcome to the charming world of Eastward - the complete edition!

Join Sam and John on a journey through a society on the brink of collapse in the Eastward base game, and discover a more peaceful parallel world for our duo in the Eastward: Octopia rural life DLC.

This bundle lets you purchase both Eastward and the Eastward: Octopia DLC together at a discounted price.
  • Eastward
  • Eastward: Octopia DLC
